name: Big Mac
description: A classic McDonald's Big Mac with two beef patties, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions, and special sauce.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a soft bun.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Crispy, golden chicken nuggets served with your choice of dipping sauce.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A delicious pizza topped with pepperoni, cheese, and tomato sauce.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy, golden french fries with a side of ketchup.

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: Crispy fried chicken breast with lettuce, mayo, and pickles on a toasted bun.

name: Shawarma
description: A soft tortilla filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Hot Dog
description: A grilled hot dog in a soft bun topped with mustard and ketchup.

name: Fried Chicken
description: Crispy, juicy fried chicken pieces with a flavorful seasoning.

name: Milkshake
description: A creamy vanilla milkshake topped with whipped cream.
